mapper.select: SELECT /* indexRegister.getJisuDuplCheck 이미 등록된 지수ID 가 존재하는지 확인한다. */ COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM tm_jisu_mast WHERE tm_jisu_mast.jisu_id = #{jisu_id}
SELECT /* indexRegister.getTmJisuTempUploadCnt [tm_jisu_temp_upload] 데이터 건수를 조회한다. */ COUNT( *) AS cnt FROM tm_jisu_temp_upload WHERE tm_jisu_temp_upload.file_id = #{file_id}

SELECT /* indexRegister.getDomainInst 기관정보를 조회한다. */ tm_user_domain.inst_cd AS inst_cd , tm_user_domain.inst_name AS inst_name
FROM tm_user_domain WHERE tm_user_domain.type_cd = #{type_cd} ORDER BY tm_user_domain.inst_cd
SELECT /* indexRegister.getHistNoByTmJisuUploadHist 지수 시퀀스 별 최신 이력번호를 조회한다. */ IFNULL( MAX( HIST_NO ), 0 ) + 1 AS hist_no FROM tm_jisu_upload_hist WHERE tm_jisu_upload_hist.jisu_seq = #{jisu_seq}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO /* indexRegister.saveTmJisuUploadHist [tm_jisu_upload_hist] 테이블에 저장한다. */ tm_jisu_upload_hist ( hist_no , jisu_seq , row_no
, jisu_file_id , col01 , col02 , col03 , col04 , col05
, reg_id , reg_time ) SELECT ${hist_no} AS hist_no , #{jisu_seq} AS jisu_seq , tm_jisu_temp_upload.row_no AS row_no
, tm_jisu_temp_upload.file_id AS file_id , tm_jisu_temp_upload.col01 AS col01 , tm_jisu_temp_upload.col02 AS col02 , tm_jisu_temp_upload.col03 AS col03 , tm_jisu_temp_upload.col04 AS col04 , tm_jisu_temp_upload.col05 AS col05
, #{user_id} AS reg_id , now() AS reg_time
FROM tm_jisu_temp_upload WHERE tm_jisu_temp_upload.file_id = #{file_id}
